message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let us know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you require further details.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I recognize the value of your product, but I'm working with a tighter budget. Would you consider a price of $700,000?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. Considering your budget constraints, I am willing to negotiate further. Our revised offer for the product is $825,000. We believe this price reflects the value of the product while accommodating your financial situation. Please let me know if this proposal works for you or if you need more information.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  To be honest, $800,000 is the absolute top of my budget. I understand this is a significant discount from your initial offer, but I'm hoping we can make a deal work.
